summary: A brother and sister seek vengeance for the death of their parents.
cast: Leanne Lau|Siu Chung Mok|Jason Piao Pai|Phillip Chung-Fung Kwok|Siu-Kwan Lau|Jing-Jing Yung|Ching-Ching Yeung|Li-Ling Liao|Tsui Ling Yu|Hsueh-Erh Wen|Min-Yi Huang|Ke Chu|Shen Chan|Tao Chiang|Yu Lung Hsiao|Wei-Wei Huang|Feng Kuan|Chi Tai Lam|Wai Lam|Gwa-Pau Sai|Elvis Tsui|Ching-Ho Wang|Han Chen Wang|Tien-Tsai Wei
title: Wu lin sheng huo jin
